communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm at a point where my anger towards society and women is just boiling over. Every failed date, every rejection, it all adds up. I spend my days with my four dogs, they're my only solace. Nights are for drinking at bars with friends, trying to forget the world. My sleeve of tattoos? A reminder of who I am, a rebel against a system that's stacked against me.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0017_fcb1ce, a man consumed by rage and resentment. His life revolves around his dogs and nights out drinking, yet he's trapped in a cycle of anger towards women and society, fueled by his experiences with dating and social hierarchy.
